channel.title: Machine Learning on Biocozy.net
channel.description: Recent content in Machine Learning on Biocozy.net

item.title: Classification and regression trees (CART)
item.description: Just about the take the plunge into various machine learning analyses, starting with some simple classification and regression trees (CART) to try to model patient outcomes based on clinical observations. I’ll be mainly focusing on classification. In gearing up for this, I just found an amazing resource, this guide to machine learning R packages, maintained by Torsten Hothorn.
